Html:
I've been working with latest build in WPF and yesterday the link to Google Satellite Maps quit working with error 404. Tries from different ISPs with same result. urls are of the form: http://khm1.google.com/kh/v=115&hl=en&x=36187&s=&y=54831&z=17&s=

Both Forms and WPF demo apps have same behavior.

Is there a new url or version required?

Thanks For the help... Awesome product!!!
FYI - Other providers work fine (Open Street Maps, Yahoo Satellite, etc)
you use old version, somehow google version detection doesn't work
